snippet: Less income and time off for families can mean less savings and a greater chance of poverty after age 65....

headline.main: South Africa's Zuma Won't Suspend Prosecutor Over Gordhan Charges
headline.print_headline: South Africa's Zuma Won't Suspend Prosecutor Over Gordhan Charges

lead_paragraph: Less income and time off for families can mean less savings and a greater chance of poverty after age 65.
